scripts.install:prod: concurrently --names 'page,product,search' \"cd team-page && npm install\" \"cd team-product && npm install\" \"cd team-search && npm install\"
scripts.install:dev: concurrently --names 'page,product,search' \"cd team-page && npm -D install\" \"cd team-product && npm -D install\" \"cd team-search && npm -D install\"
scripts.start: concurrently --names 'page,product,search' "npm run team-page:prod" "npm run team-product:prod" "npm run team-search:prod" "npm run open -- http://localhost:3000"
scripts.dev: concurrently --names 'page,product,search' "npm run team-page:dev" "npm run team-product:dev" "npm run team-search:dev" "npm run open -- http://localhost:3000"
scripts.deploy: concurrently --names 'page,product,search' \"cd team-page && flyctl deploy\" \"cd team-product && flyctl deploy\" \"cd team-search && flyctl deploy\"
